title: Bertan's Playgrounds
subtitle: A Collection of My WWDC Swift Student Challenge Playgrounds and More!

documents.title: WWDC20 Badge Creator
documents.overviewSubtitle: Create Your Own Badges for the first all online WWDC!
documents.detailSubtitle: Accepted submission for the WWDC20 Swift Student Challenge!
documents.description: WWDC20 is the first-ever all online Apple Event - and of course, the WWDC! This means all attendance to WWDC20 was online, so nobody had a conference badge. Conference badges, in my opinion, are objects with great sentimental value. They can remind you of the amazing time you had and the people you met. In my opinion, WWDC20 was even more special than other years, and it well deserves to have a badge.

documents.title: The Collatz Playground
documents.overviewSubtitle: Discover the Collatz Conjecture (3n+1) With Graphs!
documents.detailSubtitle: Draw the Collatz Conjecture (3n+1) graph of any number of your choosing!
documents.description: A simple Swift Playground I created during my library hour at school! This playground plots a Collatz conjecture (aka 3n+1) graph after entering an input number, which will always reach to zero at the end!
